attributes.action: Create a single Unitary Council in Somerset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To create a single unitary tier of government for Somerset that will:

·	eliminate confusion for staff and the public
·	reduce overlap of services 
·	reduce resource inefficiencies and 
·	ensure that the community are served better by a co-ordinated and integrated public service

The arguments against a unitary in Somerset are based on the perceived disruption 'cost' of its establishment, however there is already a long history of disruption from trying to 'work through' an archaic and politically 'broken' two-tier system, with boundary confusion, overlapping duties and much officer effort spent trying to co-ordinate a 'county' approach to many policies and programmes. Any disruption in setting up a Unitary will be short lived and will be offset by greater efficiency and improved services in the future.
